originalText.text: Arrived quite early due to a current medical situation that made traveling difficult. I was seen exactly at my appointment time. Dr. Loshigian was quick and thorough and I was on my way within 15 minutes.

text.text: Arrived quite early due to a current medical situation that made traveling difficult. I was seen exactly at my appointment time. Dr. Loshigian was quick and thorough and I was on my way within 15 minutes.

originalText.text: I am a regular patient with a recurring issue . For years I used another podiatrist who imposed increasingly restrictive conditions and demanded weekly visits with no improvement . .On my first visit Dr Loshgian diagnosed the problem and immediately made a change in the approach which bore results and improved my quality of life . Very skilled and practical .

originalText.text: Dr. Loshigian is a kind and experienced doctor. He has an easy manner and me feel very comfortable as a patient. I highly recommend him as a podiatrist.

originalText.text: I worked with Dr.Loshigian regularly and he performed my surgery. Great bedside manner and took my concerns and comments seriously. Was thorough in his analysis. Still going through recovery, but super satisfied by my care
